lines.text: There are Jews here, not idiots.
Don't you worry, Senya knows his limit.
Borya, I'm going to try to run away. Can you distract those guys?
Why? You tell them you're not Jewish, they'll kick you out themselves.
Here's the plan, we'll go to Monte Carlo, spin some roulette, and then off to Hawaii.
Me? To live with the Jews? What the hell did I forget over there? I'm the nephew of Count Yusupov, you want to see my papers?
Sohnut, a place from where Jews go to Israel.
What else would I be? My grandmother was Jewish, you want to see my papers?
Excuse me, is the taxi available?
The taxi is occupied, but my heart is available dear.
